message.name: FileName
message.text: The file in which to store the directory

message.name: CSP_E_ROLE_CREATE_FAIL
message.text: Failure creating role %s in role database %s. [%s] [%d]

message.name: CSP_E_ROLE_DELETE_FAIL
message.text: Failure deleting role %s from role database %s. [%s] [%d]

message.name: CSP_E_ROLE_LIST_FAIL
message.text: Failure listing roles from role database %s. [%s] [%d]

message.name: CSP_E_ROLE_LISTMEMBERSHIP_FAIL
message.text: Failure viewing role membership for %s from account manager %s. [%s] [%d]

message.name: CSP_S_ROLE_LISTMEMBERSHIP_SUCCESS
message.text: Role membership viewed for %s from account manager %s.

message.name: CSP_E_ROLE_ADDROLEMEMBER_FAIL
message.text: Failure adding role %s to %s from account manager %s. [%s] [%d]

message.name: CSP_S_ROLE_ADDROLEMEMBER_SUCCESS
message.text: Role %s added to %s from account manager %s.

message.name: CSP_E_ROLE_DELETEROLEMEMBER_FAIL
message.text: Failure removing role %s from %s in account manager %s. [%s] [%d]

message.name: CSP_S_ROLE_DELETEROLEMEMBER_SUCCESS
message.text: Role %s removed from %s in account manager %s.
